appendix.title: Legal notes
appendix.para: All rights, including in respect of the translation, printing and duplication of this document or parts thereof, are retained. No part of this document may be reproduced or processed with or without electronic means, in any form, without the prior written permission of &companyname;. This includes for training purposes.
Java and all Java-based trademarks and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Sun Microsystems, Inc. in the United States and other countries.
All other brand names, designs, service marks and trademarks (whether or not registered) referenced or used herein are the property of their respective owners.
